npc_lines.line: Hmm. Another stranger it seems. Let me guess, you're looking for something.
Bold move stranger. Fine. Have it your way. I didn't like it too much anyway.
I guess we have no choice but to work together stranger. Here's the key. Don't do anything stupid now.
Cursed? Is that why I haven't been able to get out? Darn, have at it stranger.

choices.line: Give me that key! I know you have it!
I am indeed. I seem to be locked here. If you can help me find the key, I can get the both of us out.
I've been told the way out is cursed. Whomever holds the key is doomed to stay here for all eternity. I can help you get out. You just have to give it to me.
No freedom for you fiend!
Thank you. Now, let's get you out of here.
I'll come back for you.

npc_lines.line: Don't have time for you. Get lost!
Ha. Someone thinks they got the guts to confront me. What are you gonna do when I turn you away in a more violent way.
Wait a second there. What is your angle? Why should I let you through?
Accident? What are you on about? I think I would have noticed an "accident".
Yeah? Get the hell out of here.
Fine, fine. You can go right ahead. Hehe. Good luck.

choices.line: I don't care much about your time. You are in my way.
Sorry to bother you. I need to head down the hallway behind you.
There's been a terrible accident. I can help, but I need you to clear the way, before it's too late.
Play tough all you want. I am willing to do anything to reach my goal. An insignificant goon won't stop me.
I apologize. I'll find another way.
Joke's on you! I am an expert practitioner of the combat arts.
Non of your business. Now let me through.
I don't have much of an angle, I'm afraid. Just trying to find out why I'm here. You'd be doing a great service to me if you let me by.
I, ahh... I was just leaving.
Fine. But I will be coming back for you.
Sorry. I'll just go.
I was leaving anyway. There's a better way, anyhow.
Good for you. I'm glad we solved this diplomatically.
Thank you. I appreciate your understanding.
I won't need it. They say I'm pretty good.
I will come back and deal with you later.
I know you wouldn't want anybody hurt on your watch? How about you just let me through.
It must be the noise, since I found out through text. Multiple lives are at stake. You have to let me through.
